entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
